## PR Checklist
- [ ] Branch name follows `feature/<area>-<short-desc>` (or `hotfix/...` if urgent)
- [ ] Tests added/updated as needed
- [ ] `pnpm lint` passes
- [ ] Docs updated (README/openapi/ADR as relevant)
- [ ] No secrets or env files committed
- [ ] Prisma migration added/updated when DB schema changes
